cause.description:
Sunday, Augest 19th, 2007 starts a jorney for Debbie Dennison, as she prepares to walk from the 4 corners of Whitby Ontario to Fort Erie Ontario...
Her mission.. As she takes one step for some that may not be here no longer.. she takes another to save one more..
One step at a time is her moto.. she helping people be more aware of the effect heart disease can leave someone.. and making it more aware to keep your heart healthy.
For more information: You can e-mail twofeetandaheartbeat22@hotmail.com
For more Info Visit: www.2feetandaheartbeat.com
1. To Fight Heart Disease
2. To Bring Awareness
3. Get Fit
cause.mission: To Raise Awarness About Heart Disease and Stroke
cause.name: Two Feet & A Heartbeat Walk.. All Proceeds Go To The Heart & Stroke of Ontario
